item.title: @elonmusk: ELON: TRUTH AND CURIOSITY KEEP AI SANE ‚ÄúTruth will prevent AI from going insane. Curiosity will fost...
item.description: ELON: TRUTH AND CURIOSITY KEEP AI SANE ‚ÄúTruth will prevent AI from going insane. Curiosity will foster any form of sentience. We‚Äôre more interesting than a bunch of rocks. If it‚Äôs curious, it will foster humanity. If it has a sense of beauty, it will be a great future. That applies to AI just as it applies to biological life.‚Äù Source:@ianmiles

item.title: @elonmusk: NEW: Shocking details emerge in this triple homicide out of Florida Turns out Ahmad Jihad Bojeh shot...
item.description: NEW: Shocking details emerge in this triple homicide out of Florida Turns out Ahmad Jihad Bojeh shot up a Wawa in 2021 where one victim was shot several times and nearly died. A judge let him back out into the community on an insanity plea. The judge has the blood of three innocent people on his hands.

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON: AI PROGRESS IS BLOWING MY MIND MULTIPLE TIMES A WEEK ‚ÄúWe're in the singularity. We're at the t...
item.description: ELON: AI PROGRESS IS BLOWING MY MIND MULTIPLE TIMES A WEEK ‚ÄúWe're in the singularity. We're at the top of the rollercoaster, and you're about to go down. I don't just have courtside seats: I'm on the court. And it blows my mind, and it still blows my mind, sometimes multiple times a week. I'm like, wow and then two days later, more wow! I think we'll hit AGI next year in 2026.‚Äù Source:@elonmuskin Moonshot ‚Äì Discussion with@PeterDiamandisand@DavidBlundin, January 2026

item.title: @elonmusk: ‚ÄúWe were told to label newly arrived ILLEGALS as ‚ÄòPERMANENTLY disabled‚Äô ‚Äî even for headaches or back...
item.description: ‚ÄúWe were told to label newly arrived ILLEGALS as ‚ÄòPERMANENTLY disabled‚Äô ‚Äî even for headaches or back pain ‚Äî so they‚Äôd get Social Security for LIFE.‚Äù ‚ÄúOnce they‚Äôre classified, that‚Äôs it ‚Äî they‚Äôre set FOREVER. That‚Äôs exactly what they wanted us to do.‚Äù

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON: THE ECONOMY IS NOT A MAGIC CORNUCOPIA ‚ÄúSome people have this absurd view that the economy is l...
item.description: ELON: THE ECONOMY IS NOT A MAGIC CORNUCOPIA ‚ÄúSome people have this absurd view that the economy is like some magic horn of plenty. Like it just makes stuff. Goods and services just come from this magic corner of plenty. And if somebody has more stuff than somebody else, it‚Äôs because they took more from this magic corner of plenty.‚Äù Source:@joerogan

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: WE ARE REALLY TRYING TO BRING THE WORLD TOGETHER INTO A COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS ùïè is kin...
item.description: ELON MUSK: WE ARE REALLY TRYING TO BRING THE WORLD TOGETHER INTO A COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS ùïè is kind of a global town square where people can say what they want to say with words, pictures, video Where there's a secure messaging system we've recently added the ability to do audio and video calls So really trying to bring the world together into a collective consciousness And that's different from just saying, 'What is the most dopamine-generating video stream that one could make?' Which I think can be a little bit of brain rot If you're just watching videos that cause dopamine hits one after another but lack substance, then I think that's not a great way to spend time

item.description: I was interviewed by BBC along w/@ChiOnwurahabout@Keir_StarmerCOS Morgan McSweeney, who started Center for Countering Digital Hate (CCDH). Onwurah lied to listeners claiming "Conservatives" passed Online Safety Act, no Morgan McSweeney's CCDH. Yes, but the Conservative was Damien Collins, who was on the board of CCDH. Does Onwurah not know what's going on inside her own government?@EthanCroft98@paddymacc1@AvaSantina@WorldByWolf@jodymcintyre_@kennardmatt@Ian_Fraser@NJ_Timothy@SteveNickSmith@CharlotteCGill@JuliaHB1
